articles.title: Navy issues apology for destroying Alaska Native village in 1882 - CBS News
articles.description: The attack on Angoon was one of a series of conflicts between the American military and Alaska Natives in the years after the U.S. bought the territory from Russia in 1867.
articles.content: Shells fell on the Alaska Native village as winter approached, and then sailors landed and burned what was left of homes, food caches and canoes. Conditions grew so dire in the following months that … [+5720 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: American Airlines tries new technology to shame line cutters - OregonLive
articles.description: The technology alerts gate agents with an audible sound if a passenger tries to scan their ticket ahead of their assigned boarding group.
articles.content:
American Airlines is testing an audible alert for when people try to board before their group is called.Robert Alexander/Getty Images
